instructions: Put the charger in the middle of the tablecloth
After put the dinner fork on the left side of the charger
After, put the dinner knife on the right side of the charger
After, put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork but on right side of the charger
Put the salad knife between the charger and the dinner knife
Put the soup spoon on the right side of the salad knife
Put the desert spoon above the charger laying horizontally and the bowl is facing the forks
Put the desert fork directly under the desert spoon, horizontally, with prongs facing knives
Place the bread plate to the left of the desert spoon above the forks
Place a butter knife going diagonally across the bread plate with the blade facing northwest
Place a water glass on the right of the desert fork
Place a napkin in the middle of the plate horizontally
